#line 1 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/15_Transparency/Shaders/D3D12/copy.frag"
#line 26 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/15_Transparency/Shaders/D3D12/copy.frag"
struct VSOutput
{
	float4 Position : SV_POSITION;
	float4 UV : TEXCOORD0;
};

Texture2D Source : register(t0);
SamplerState PointSampler : register(s0);

float4 main(VSOutput input) : SV_Target
{
	return Source.Sample(PointSampler, input.UV.xy);
}
